speaker.whotheyare: Olivia Arthur is a London-based photographer known for her work examining people and their personal and cultural identities.
speaker.whylisten: Olivia Arthur's first book, Jeddah Diary, follows the lives of young women in Saudi Arabia. Her second book, Stranger, is a journey into Dubai through the eyes of the survivor of a shipwreck. Her work has been exhibited in international institutional collections and published in the New Yorker, Vogue and TIME. Arthur became a member of Magnum Photos in 2013 and in 2020 was elected as its president. She studied mathematics at Oxford University and photojournalism at the London College of Printing.
